exitDialog.title: Are you sure you want to exit?
exitDialog.description: You have not completed the test. All your answers will be saved as a draft.

startDialog.title: Start the test
startDialog.description: The test consists of <1>{{parts}} parts</1> and you will have <1>{{minutes}} minutes</1> to complete it. You <1>cannot stop midway</1> and the test will be automatically submitted after {{minutes}} minutes.

submitDialog.title: Are you sure you want to submit?
submitDialog.description: You have not completed all the questions in the test and there is still time left.

beforeStart.title: Before you start
beforeStart.welcome: Welcome to the LapinLearn test mode!
steps: This guide will help you understand the main features of the application.
The timer will not start until you complete this guide.
You can skip the guide or review it at any time in the settings.

end.title: End
steps: You can now start the test or review this guide at any time.
Good luck with your practice and achieving your desired score!

timer.title: Timer
timer.description: The timer is displayed at the top right corner of the screen, indicating the remaining time for the current section.

content.title: Reading Section
content.description: This is the reading section. Scroll down to read the entire content of the passage. The passages are divided into smaller sections for easier navigation.

answerSheet.title: Answer Sheet
answerSheet.description: Select the correct answer (if it's a multiple-choice question) or fill in the blank (if it's an essay question).

questionNavigator.title: Question Navigator
questionNavigator.description: At the bottom of the screen, you will see the question navigation bar. Click on a number to jump to the corresponding question. The current question will be highlighted, and unanswered questions will be marked.

backAndNext.title: Back and Next Buttons
backAndNext.description: Use the Back button to return to the previous part. Use the Next button to move to the next part.

submit.title: Submit Button
submit.description: When you have completed all the questions, click the Submit button to finish the test. If time runs out, your test will be automatically submitted.

quit.title: Quit Button
quit.description: Click the Quit button to leave the test at any time. Your progress may not be saved if you quit without submitting.

speaking.microphoneTest: You have {{ seconds }} seconds to test the Microphone
speaking.microphonePermission: To use the Microphone, you need to grant permission for the Microphone on your device
speaking.microphoneDeniedDescription: Please allow microphone permission to record audio.
speaking.browserNotSupportDescription: This browser does not support audio recording.

practice.title: Unlimited Time
practice.content: In this mode, your thinking and speaking time will not be limited, allowing you to practice comfortably without worrying about time.

practice.title: Practice by Section
practice.content: Helps you focus on practicing each detailed section before combining the entire test. You cannot go back, the system will record the entire test and you can only listen back when completed.

practice.title: Automatic Question Reading System
practice.content: The system automatically reads the questions for each section, with a clear voice and standard speed. Additionally, the system allows you to ask and listen to the question again up to 2 times, helping to clarify the content of the question.

full_test.title: Real Test Time
full_test.content: In this mode, you will have thinking and speaking time as in the real test, helping you get used to the time pressure and improve your time management skills.

full_test.title: Complete All Sections
full_test.content: You will complete the test as a real test consisting of 3 sections.

full_test.title: Automatic Question Reading System
full_test.content: The system automatically reads the questions for each section, with a clear voice and standard speed. Additionally, the system allows you to ask and listen to the question again up to 2 times, helping to clarify the content of the question.
